metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3815 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The NVIDIA camera driver in Android before 2016-07-05 on Nexus 9 devicesallows attackers to obtain sensitive information via a crafted application,aka Android internal bug 28522274.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
